biotools.summary: Dissimilarity propagation-guided graph-Laplacian principal component analysis (DP-GLPCA) is a model for constrained clustering. By fully utilizing a limited number of weakly supervisory information in the form of pairwise constraints, the proposed DP-GLPCA is capable of capturing both the local and global structures of input samples to exploit their characteristics for excellent clustering.
